data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tang, Chufei, Zhu, Yajun, Yang, Ding (2019): Sciapodinae from the Himalayan region with description of nine new species from Tibet (Diptera: Dolichopodidae). Zootaxa 4577 (1): 1-28, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4577.1.1|54 occurrences
